issue.title: [Rust] Clippy CI is failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11602](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11602). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CI uses "stable" rust
1.50 stable was updated today: https://blog.rust-lang.org/2021/02/11/Rust-1.50.0.html

The new clippy is pickier resulting in many clippy warnings such as https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9469/checks?check_run_id=1881854256

We need to get CI back green

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11602?focusedCommentId=17283401) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Dupe of ARROW-11603

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11602?focusedCommentId=17585801) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
